name: A Night In The Forest
author: Tonya M.B
description:
Sachiko  Minami is a talented young girl, who is involved in basically everything. From schoolwork, to pollution! 
One day, her enthusiasm has been taken too far, when one of her closest friends plays a prank on her.
A large series of events take place in front of Sachiko and getting her pranker away and out of her life forever, will Sachiko get through them all in success?
